recipes.win_app_iis::put_file: Uploads a file to an S3 bucket
recipes.win_app_iis::get_file: Retrieves a file from an S3 bucket

long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Recipes for working with S3 buckets

= REQUIREMENTS:


= ATTRIBUTES: 

See metadata.rb

= USAGE:

Designed to be run within a RightScale ServerTemplate
name: win_app_iis
license:
Copyright (c) 2010 RightScale, Inc.

All rights reserved

win_app_iis/file_path.description: The full path to the file to be uploaded. Ex: c:\tmp\my.txt

svn/force_checkout.description: A value of 'false' will attempt an svn update where 'true' will do a full checkout

win_app_iis/download_dir.description: The directory where the file from s3 will be downloaded. Ex: c:\tmp\

svn/password.description: The SVN password that is used to checkout the application code from SVN repository.

s3/bucket.description: The name of the S3 bucket

svn/username.description: The SVN username that is used to checkout the application code from SVN repository

aws/access_key_id.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve you access identifiers. Ex: 1JHQQ4KVEVM02KVEVM02

s3/file.description: Name of the file on s3. When ignored, it will use the name in the File Path

aws/secret_access_key.description: This is an Amazon credential.  Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve your access identifiers. Ex: XVdxPgOM4auGcMlPz61IZGotpr9LzzI07tT8s2Ws

svn/repo_path.description: The URL of your SVN repository where your application code will be checked out from.  Ex: http://mysvn.net/app/
